___________________________________________________

name: HAMMER AND THE NAILS ~ Rome Is Burning / Product Of This Modern Age
description:
Finally after a long delay... your heroes here at RRD bring you the finest knuckle dragging reality rock from Boston, containing
one new track backed by a newly recorded version of Product Of This Modern Age from HATN's demo tape. Not for the intelligent or faint of heart.

Purveyors of some of the finest current American Oi! (we think best).

*****LIMIT 1 OF EACH COLOR PER CUSTOMER*****
(100 for mailorder only)

*Note: the color is a dark burgandy - VERY close to black. With all the delays... we left it as is. So you've been told... don't whine if you don't like it.

name: The BRUISERS ~ Independence Day LP
description:
Rock n Roll Disgrace is proud to (finally) bring you the highly anticipated: THE BRUISERS - INDEPENDENCE DAY on vinyl for the first time. A true landmark release in American Oi! - this album changed the game and helped to define early 90s US Oi! 

We are talking about a true classic that is an essential for any vinyl Oi! collector. This release contains our favorite Bruisers material and sounds unbelievable on vinyl.

You can finally put away the creaky cassette you bought in 1990 (or on eBay last year). This highly limited release (it was cassette-only, 22 years ago!) has been reissued on CD a few times and hidden away on compilations. We felt that needed to be rectified and given a release worthy of it's legacy.

A true labor of love for the RRD crew, this has been in the works for 2+ years and now we are happy to finally bring it to you the way it was meant to be released: on a hefty 12" platter of certified maximum USA Oi!

Pressing Info:

Embossed Cover
100 Clear Vinyl w/ Poster (**Mailorder Only) - SOLD OUT
200 Blue Translucent Vinyl
200 Red Translucent Vinyl
200 White Vinyl
300 Black

name: LONDON DIEHARDS ~ Theres Lies, Damn Lies and Theres The London Diehards 12" LP
description:
The long anticipated vinyl release from one of the best current Oi! bands in the world

Limited Edition 12"

Your choice:
Yellow vinyl - limited to 113 - w/ hand numbered poster and black insert
Clear vinyl - limited to 152 - w/ yellow insert
Black vinyl - limited to 266 - w/ white insert

(for a package of all three colors, click "There's Lies, Damn Lies... 3-pack" in the RRD store)

London Diehards have been called "definitely the best we've heard from the UK since the Straw Dogs".

RRD doesn't expect these to last long - order before they are gone!

name: LONDON DIEHARDS ~ Great Britain 7"
description:
LONDON DIEHARDS - Great Britain 7"

Limited Edition 7" w/ Die-Cut sleeve.

Your choice:
Clear vinyl - limited to 100 - SOLD OUT
Black vinyl - limited to 400 - still a few left in stock


Review from Painkiller Records:
"Four songs of hard-hitting Oi! from this new British band, definitely the best we've heard from the UK since the Straw Dogs. Comes in a great die-cut sleeve."

name: HAMMER AND THE NAILS ~ Maxi E.P. 12"
description:
HAMMER AND THE NAILS - MAXI E.P. 12" - Black Vinyl

****LAST COPIES****

(the mail order-only clear vinyl is SOLD OUT)

New 5 song 12" from this Boston band. Formed by members of Close Call and Fit For Abuse in the early '00s, they didn't get their act together until about 2008, recording a demo and this 12" that pays homage to some of the early European Oi! bands.



Contact for wholesale

name: P.R.O.B.L.E.M.S. ~ It Dont Have To Be Like This / Buzz Off 7"
description:
P.R.O.B.L.E.M.S. - It Don't Have To Be Like This / Buzz Off 7"


Third 7" from Portland, OR's P.R.O.B.L.E.M.S, featuring original Poison Idea drummer Dean Johnson and Kelly Halliburton of SHOS, Pierced Arrows, etc. Two great new tracks of amped up, blown out punk rock... not unlike a stripped down later-era Poison Idea or a roided-out New Bomb Turks.


Your choice:
Red Wax - 75 pressed total - 30 for RRD online store, band has the rest on tour
Clear wax - 75 pressed
black wax - 300 pressed

name: TOMMY AND THE TERRORS ~ Problem. Reaction. Solution. 7"
description:

4 new songs from this Boston band and their best material to date.


Contact for wholesale

name: T.H.U.G. ~ T.H.U.G. LP
description:
T.H.U.G. - T.H.U.G. LP 

****LAST COPIES****

RRD is doing the limited vinyl press of this much anticipated release.

From the streets of Sydney, Australia, these five menacing, tattooed bruisers don't PLAY their songs so much as BEAT them out of their instruments. T.H.U.G. are aptly-named, and their music is an extension of that. Real-life lyrics take a realistic, if cynical approach to modern life, friends, enemies, and coping with the pain of death, wrapped up in tunes that will have you singing along and possibly bashing people in the head while doing so. Taking a nod to classic Aussie bands like Quick & the Dead and Rose Tattoo, as well as the tough British Oi! bands like the 4-Skins and Condemned 84. Featuring guest vocals from Angry Anderson of Rose Tattoo. This is one of the best records in the last 15 years. A must-have.

Contact for wholesale

description:
SUPERYOB - Aggrophobia LP
